member.name: D2D1_BRUSH_PROPERTIES
member.summary: Describes the opacity and transformation of a brush.

member.name: D2D1_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.opacity
member.summary: A value between 0.0f and 1.0f, inclusive, that specifies the degree of opacity of the brush.

member.name: D2D1_BRUSH_PROPERTIES.transform
member.summary: The transformation that is applied to the brush.
